A

addBoat(ObjectOutputStream, String, String, Double) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is called whenever a user decides to add a new boat to his list.
addEvent(ObjectOutputStream, Integer, Integer) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is called when a user wants to subscribe to a precise competition.
addPartner(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
It has the purpose to insert all the details of the registering user onto the database if all the fields have been properly filled.
addPayment(String, Integer, String, String, Integer, String, Double, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is called when a payment is successful and we want it to be added into the paymentHistory database table with the relative details.
addPaymentMethod(String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is called when, during the payment, the user decides to add a new payment method (both with Credit Card and IBAN).
addTextLimiter(TextField, int) - Static method in class Controller_FXML.Controller_Pay
This method is useful to set a max length on the fields relative to the IBAN, Card Number, Card Expiration and Card CVC.
